title: Add expanded CLI help text for new commands
description:
Update CLI help text with detailed examples for new workflow commands:

Commands needing help text updates:
- tk create: --requires, --awaiting flags
- tk update: --awaiting, --verdict flags  
- tk approve: new command
- tk reject: new command with feedback
- tk list --awaiting: new filter
- tk next --awaiting: human mode
- tk note --from: author flag

Reference docs/AGENT_HUMAN_WORKFLOW.md 'CLI Help Text Examples' section for exact format.

Acceptance criteria:
- [ ] All new flags documented in --help
- [ ] Examples provided for common workflows
- [ ] Deprecation warning for --manual mentioned
